mapper.select: SELECT TS_SEQ, ALBA_SEQ, TS_DATE, TS_DATETIME, TS_WORKHOUR FROM TIMESHEET
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TIMESHEET(TS_SEQ, ALBA_SEQ, TS_DATE, TS_DATETIME, TS_WORKHOUR) VALUES(TS_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{alba_seq}, #{ts_date}, #{ts_datetime}, #{ts_workhour})
mapper.update: UPDATE TIMESHEET SET TS_DATETIME = #{ts_datetime}, TS_WORKHOUR = #{ts_workhour} WHERE TS_SEQ = #{ts_seq}
